issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: WM: allow not specifying scheduling policy when creating a pool

comments.body:
Looks like out file requires some changes, at least for me - otherwise the test doesn't run locally due to missing host name.
Also some sysdb tables are missing...
A small patch, except for the large out file update.
